summary: The Grimace Shake is a fun, berry-flavored milkshake created by McDonald's. It was first sold in the U.S. to celebrate Grimace's birthday, a famous McDonaldland character. Later, it was introduced in Canada, the UK, and Australia for limited times. This shake became super popular on social media, especially on TikTok and YouTube, where people shared funny videos of themselves drinking it and then experiencing scary, staged situations. It was a tasty treat that brought a lot of joy and laughter to fans!
title: Grimace Shake
